du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du la phal to/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang ba 2 tshad med pa// grangs mod pa/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa/
mtshungs pa med pa// gzhal du med pa/ dpag tu med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ rab 'byor du ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i di ni rin po
che'o rabu 'byor do la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni 'di yin te/ sems can dmyal pa las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o/ byol song gi skye gnas dang/ gshin/
rje'i 'jig rten dang/ mi dang lha dbul bo las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o// rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// bram ze'i rigs tsha zhing mtho ba'i rigs
'byin pa'o// khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// 'du shes med 'du shes med min
skya mchod kyi bar gyi lha'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// ngag
bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chubu 'byin pa'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ da ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i
las kyi lam rgyas par bstan te/ de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba/
ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi' ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum dang mtsho dang/ dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lta
tsho rnams yod do// tshangs ris dang/ tshangs lha nye phan dang/ tshongs pa kun 'khor dang/ tshangs chen dang/ snang ba dang/ rlung snang dang/ tshad med snang ba dang/ kun snang dang bu dang/
dge ba dang/ rlung dge dang/ tshod med ngag pa dang/ dgo rgyus dang/che ba dang/ chung tshe dang/ tshod med tsha ba dang/ 'bras bu tshe gu dang/ mi che ba dang/ mi gdung ba dang/ shin tu
mthong ba dang/ gya nom snang ba dang/ 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mgrwar yas skye mched dang/ cung zad med
ba'i skye mched dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir ma 'ong ba'i
'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid du/ rang byang chung 'ong do// slan med pa yang ngug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yod na/ bsam
gtan bzhu yod do// tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi tshu rol tu phyin pa dang/ shis
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do//
'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar
gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/
ting nge 'dzin thams cad dad/ gzus kyi sgo thams cad yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag ra rig pa bzhi/
dang/ byams pa na ba dang/ snying rjechen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do// de
yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de thams cad rgyu char bstan te/ de la bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing
mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi' ris kyi lha rnams yong do// sum cu rtsa gsum dad/ mtsho ma dang/ dga' ldan
dang 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dud/ tshongs rjes dang/ tshangs lha te phan dang tshangs pa kun 'khor dang/ ris chen dang/ snang ba dang/ chu snang dang/
tshad med snang ba dang/ kun snang dang ba dang/ dgo ba dang/ chung dgo dang/ tshad med dge ba dang dge rgyas dang/ cho ba dang/ rlung che dang tshang med che ba dang/ 'bras bu cha ba
dang/ mi che bdang mi gdung ba dang/ shin tu mthong ba dang/ gya nom snang bu dang/ 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yasaskye mched dang/ rnam shes mtha'
yas skye mched dang cung zad med ba'i skye mched dang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba
dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// de bas na de ni nga rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o// pha rol phyin pa rin po che du la ni chos gang yang skye
ba lam/ 'gag pa'i m/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ dor ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang skyo ba
'am 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung bu 'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos de la bu med do// rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po
cho 'di la ni dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag ba med pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang
yang dmigs su med de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rin po man dmigs su med do// rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni sa/
gang gis kyang 'go ba mad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gangu 'go bar gyur pa'i chos de lta bu dmigs su med de/ rab 'byor de'i phyir na pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'go kha
med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'o// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar 'du shes par yang
mi byed la/ de ltar mi rtog cing/ de ltar mi dmigs te/ de ltar 'phro ba yang mi byed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sod pa sta/ nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom
pa'o// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shing/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
lu rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dung/ bas stang du bya ba drang/ mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nus sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can yongs su
smin par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar byod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
sa gang yang ston pa 'am/ rnam par ston pa 'am/ yongs su ston pa 'am/ 'dzin par byed pa 'am/ 'byin par byed pa 'am/ skye bar byed pa 'am/'gag par byed pa
'am/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar byed pa 'am/ 'grib par byed pa 'am 'phel bar byed pa 'am/ 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar
byung bar spyod pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin
gzugs kyi khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed du ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin no//
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi lA rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ snang stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ ngangos po med pa'i
ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ byang rmub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
@#// bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam par thar pa
dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ stong pa nyid ngang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes/ pa rnams
sgrub pa ma yon 'dor ba ma yin/ ting nga'adzana rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/
spyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ gangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong
ba'i 'bras bu dad/dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rang byang chub sgrub pa ma yawe/ 'do'i bu ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/
'ar pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin//
gcig ba/// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams sgrub pa ma yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dong chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos skyon med
ba de ni de bzhin du gnas pa yin te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas so// mngon par thugs su chud do// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par
thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo// ston to// brjod do// 'grel to// rnam par 'byed do// yang dag par gsol bar mdzad do// yang dag par ston to// de nas lha'i
bu stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ lhung lhung legs kyi sgra phyung// lha rdzas kyi ma ga ut+pal dang/ pad+mo dang/ ku mu ta dang/ puN+Da ri ka dang/ maN+Da ra ba dang/

man+da ra ba chen po 'byor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to// kye ma shes rabo kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'debastan pas/ lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur
te 'dzam bu gling du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba mthong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnas brtan rabi 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'dan chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba yang ma yin/ gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa 'di yang chos gang la yang 'khor ba 'am/ mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir lta bur gnas pa ma yin no//gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
ba 'di chos gang la yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du zhe bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mtshes pa'i ngo ba 'di stong pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
dang / bzod pa' pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo// nang stong pa nyid nang stong ba nyid
kyis stong ngo// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis snyir ngo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
kyis stong ngo// yang dag par sbyong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags
ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ngo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang//
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i soms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med/
ba dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi skyo rnams
kyis stong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ byam pa chen po dang/ sAng rje chen
bo dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo// rgyumadu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo//
lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus song ngo// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bus bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus snying ngo// dgra bcom pa nyid daklu
brtson pa nyid kyis stong ngo// rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ngo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa da lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo/// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa 'di na chen po ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// de ni chos thams cad kyang chos krams rud kyis stong ngo// byang chung sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pa rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya yang//
chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis/ chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor 'a// chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am/ mi 'khor ba 'am/ rab tu 'khor bar bgyis
pa ma mchis te/ de dag ni chos gang yang yongs su mthong pa 'am/ yongs su ma mthong bu ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nga ni 'di ltar ga 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am/ mi
[@]1 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am rab tu 'khor bar bgyi ba'i tshos de lta bu dmigs su ma mchis te/ de na 'di ltar chos thams cad kyang shin tu mngon par ma grub pa 'o// de ci'i slad
du zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa lalas mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa lam/ ma 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags
so smon pa ma mchis pa ni 'khor par bgyid pa 'am/ mi 'khor par pagyid pa ma lags so// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang/ rang tu b+hAstan pa dang/ bsgrags
pa dang/ rab tu dgod pa dang gzhag pa dang/ rnam par dbye ba dang/ rnam par dgrol ba dang/ smos pa dang/ gsol bar bgyi ba dang/ yang dag par bstan pa 'di nirigs rang
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung ngo// gang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang la
bzung ba de ni/ sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so// gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la gang su yang sbyin pa ' gnas
su 'gyur ba ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u lcigu brgyad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyisA 2 bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga 'ad ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu dran pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
@#// stsal ba/ chos thams cad mnyam pa kid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi kha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par dban pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mtha' las langs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi la'o tu phyin pa/
'din thung pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis paNapastsal pa/ chos thams rung ngamags su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa// gcom ldan 'das 'delta ste//
shes rab kyi larol tu phyin pa 'dra ni gnas ma mchis pa'i snga rol tu phyin pa'o// shAcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ming dang lus med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi phu rol tu phyin pa 'di nan ma bar pha rol tu phyin pa spro//ngu com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dbugs phyi nang du rgyub med pa'i phyir ro//
gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa na ni brjod du ma mchis pa lnga sel sgron tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'dus kyis bkar stsal ba// rnam par
rtog pa dang/ rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ 3gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin
ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ra ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa// bcom ldan
'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa' pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i
phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'angs 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis nga ka' stsal pa/
chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro// gsol// brtsom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skad cig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// chos thams cad byung zhing zad pa 'i nga de ro/ gsol pa kA bcom ldan 'das 'di las/ shes rab kyi pha ro'u tu phyin pa 'dini skye ba
ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang 'gag pa med ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
si lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa pa ma mchis pa'i pha rolaM tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
za ]@#// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shos ga pha rol tu phyin pa 'di shis pu po ma mchi da pa' ba rdzogs tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'dus kyis
bka' stsal ba/ shes pa po dmags su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni'u zho ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu/
phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi ba dang skye gu dmigs su me 'phyir ro// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa me mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
@# 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dan rmi lam spyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ 'dom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmi lam mgrong ba ngamigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgra don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyan pa dang sgrar brjod/
pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ ba
stsal pa// me long gi bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'adas 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i
rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gusol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
phyin pa 'di ni spos pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dmags su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa// bcom

pa'o[;] de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'disAm du gyur to/ shes rab gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gi rna lam du grag pa do dag ni
sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsar bkun byas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni de bzhin gdags pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'disems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su gzung ba'o// gang 'dzin rung 'chang ba dang/ klog cing kun chub bar byed
pa dang/ tshul bzhin yid la byed cingagazung ba dang/ bsrung ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byas nas kyang/ de bzhin nyid du shes rngab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa lta
ci smos te/ gas kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs/ mi sngang/ skyag par ma 'gyur ba de dug gis/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshog
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su dris so// yongs su zhus so// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
0 'di gros nas mi 'jigs mi sngang/ skag par ma 'gyu la/ 'dzin cing 'tshar ba dang/ klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dug gis na bskal pa bya
ba mang por/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod do/ / tshul khrims dang/ brjod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod do
sAm pa dang/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bus 2 bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mi 'jigs/ ma sngang/ skrag par mi 'gyur la/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang/ klog cing kun chub bar bgyid pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yang la 'gying
ba de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a sams dpa' chen po dang 'dra bar gzung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldanu 'dus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
zab pa ste/ sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug la ma sbyang nga na ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mos par bgyi bar ma nus so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu
'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shos rang kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar soms pa de dag gis ni/ sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di skye par gyur
to de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa'i tsho/ dad pa dang
chos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang dag par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams dang nyan shos rnams la bsan bkur ma bgyis te/ sbyin pa'i rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar sdud par bgyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
bzod pa'i grwa rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/
nang stong ba nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom
glabar bgyi/ yang dag par spong bu rnams dung/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dwang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthur gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang// mtshan ma med bu dang/ smon pa med pa
dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs rnams/
dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su ma zhus/ yongs
de nAs lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshid ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa
'di ni shin tu zab na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa 'i tshe/ sngon ma sprad pa'i byang chub sen sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos nga ra ma 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshe
bangacin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam
ga tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
pa nyid kyi bar dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dad/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnam dang//

gzugakhamed ba'i snyom par 'jug pa'i ms dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar cig gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon bar shes pa rnams dang/ ting 'dzin rnams
dung gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stong sa bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/
snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar yang ci cho btsun pa shA ra dwa
ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// ko'u shi kA de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a phyag
'tshal ba ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhen ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cang
mkhyen ba nyid do// rnam pa shrams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjong ngo// ko'u shi ka thams cad mkhyen nga 'i ye shes nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i/
rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi pho shis bsgrub par 'dod pa dang/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor
bya'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ra bya'o//
sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'a'abras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par
'dod pa dang/ rang phyonganub la dgod par 'dod pa dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubu la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// soms can rnams 'tshang rgya ba 'di la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o//
khams gsum gyi phul du gyur par 'dod nga 'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// bdud thams cad pham par bya bar 'dod pa 'i ]
bya// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// dge slong gi dge 'dun 'du bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am 'jigs
kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lugs ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
phyin pa dang/ brtson 'a gras kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags
bcom ldan 'dus ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sdod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i srol tu phyin pa la brtson par pagyid pa lags/
smi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu na pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar n nang stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos bo ma da pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la brtson ba/
bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na 'bags pa'ibaden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams
dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgu dang//
stong pa nyid dud/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnamus la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs
kyi sgo rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dad/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/
byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
snya'akhA/ ko'u shi ka de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su dra bar sams pa legs so legs so//
ko'u shi ka khyod kyis spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ngo// ko'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha la
@#// tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'i tsha gzugs la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tsho/ gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no// tshor ba
dang 'du zhus dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa la ma gnas te/ gang gi tsha rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed pa
yin no// mig la mi gnas to/ gang gi tshe na gal mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mag la brtson par byed pa yin no// rna ba dang sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid la mi
gnas te/ gang gi tshad la ma gnas pa de'i tsha yid la brtson par byed pa yin no// gzugs la ma gnas taM/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'atsho/ gzugs
la brtson par byed pa yin no// sgra dung/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg dang/ chos la mi gnas tu gdu ga tsho chos la mi gnas pa de'i tsho/ chos la brtson par byed pa yin no//
tshomig gi rnam par shes pa la ma gnas/ ma gi 'dus te rtog pa la mi gnas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba la mi gnus/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ 7 dang/
lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas te/ gang gi tsho yod kyi
['dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la brtson par byed pa yin no// sa'i khams la mi gnas te/ gang
gi tshe sa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i tsho/ sa'i khams la brtson bar byed pa yin no// chu'i khams dang/ ma'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams dang/ nam mkha' 'ams
dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams las gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'atsho/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no/
ma rig pa lu ma gnas te/ gang gi tshe ma rig pa la mi gnas pa de'i tsho/ ma rig pa la brtson par byed pa yin no// 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ ming dang gzug
dang skye mched drug dang/ reg pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ srid pa dang/ len pa dang/ srid pa dang/ skya ba dang/ rga la ma gnas te/ gang gi tshe rga shi la mi gnas pa de'i
tshe rga shi la brtson par byed pa yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma gnas te/ gang gi tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma gnas pa de'i tsha/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
brtson par byed pa yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas te gang gi tsha shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mu gnas pa de'i tsho/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la
sha brtson par byed pa yin no// nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas te/ gang gi nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'atsho/ nang stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no// dngos po med
ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyibar la ma gnas te/ gang gi tsho dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma gnas pa de'/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
la la brtson par byed pa yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tsho dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ma gnas pa de'i tsho/ dran pa lta bur gzhag
pa rnams la ban par byed pa yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan
lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas te/ gong gi cho 'phags pa 'am yaM/na lag brgyad pa la mi gnas pa de'i/ 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par byed pa yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tsha gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i sAmA jug pa rnams la brtson par
byed pa yin no// rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/mngon/
bar shes pa rnams la ma gnas te/ gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams
dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang 1 byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
brgyadal mi gnas te/ gang gi tsho sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma gnas pa de'i tsho/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par byed pa yanye ni//
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras dudang// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ gra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub la mi gnas te/ gang gi
tsho'ang byang chub la ma gnas pa de'i tshe/ rang byang chub la brtson par byed pa man no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidal/
ma gnas te/ gang katsho rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ma gnas pa do'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhin/
ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba dang/ gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs ma dmigs so// gang la gnas par bya ba dang/ gang la brtson bar bya ba de
bu'i tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dad/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa ma dmigs so// gang la gnas par bya ba dang/ gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i skyed mched dang//
khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma dmigs su// gang la gnas par bya ba dang/ gang la brtson par bya ba da lta bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang/ stong pa nyid thamA
cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chose sum cu rtsa bdun me dmigs so// gang la gnas bar bya ba dang/ gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/
bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
'jug ba dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshanum med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon bar shes pa rnams mi dmags so// ting nge 'dzinu rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo
rnams ma dmigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa ngazhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ sAng rje chen po dang/
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang//
ngagrang com pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub mi dmags so// lam gyi rnam pa shes nyid dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mu dmags so// ko'u shi ka gzhan
pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mi sbyor ma 'byed de/ gang gi tshe gzugs la ma shor mi 'byed pa de'i
tshe gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam bshas pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe 'dzashes ba mo 'byed pa'i
tsa rnam par shes pa la brtson pa ra byed pa yin no/ skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mi sbyor ma 'byed de/ gang gi tsho rten cing 'brel par 'byung
cha la mi sbyo mi 'byed ba de'i tshe/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa la brtson par byed pa yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang/ stong pa nyid thums cad
nga byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa dadun la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sbyor me 'byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
chos sum cu rtsa bdun la brtson par byed pa yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med ba rnams dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag dang/ stong ba nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa
mngon par shes pa rnams la mi sbyor mu 'byed de/ gang gi tsho mngon par shes pa rnams la ma sbyor ma 'byed pa de'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams lu brtson par byed pa yin no//
te deng 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ma sbyor me 'a byed de/ gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ma sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed
pa yin no// de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs bcu dad/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'atsho/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
rgyang la brtson par byed pa yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi sbyor mi 'byed da/ gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ma sbyor me 'byed pa de'i
tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rje shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa 'bu sdod pa'i/ gzugs sngon gyi mgrar ma ngalegs so// gzugs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ dwagazugs dbus su ma dmigs so/ 3chor ba dang/ 'du/
shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa dbus su ma dmigs so//
skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sngon gyi mtha' ma ngamags so// rten rung 'brel par 'byung ba phyi ma'i mthar ma dmigs so// rten cing 'brel par
'byung ba dbus su mi ngamigs so// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sngon gyi mthur mi ngamigs so//
byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dbus su mi mgos so// 'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar
gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams ston gyi mthar ma ngalags so//
mngon bgyis pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams dbus su mi ngamigs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sngon gyi mthar
ma dmags so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dbus su ma ngamigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jig/
ba bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ sang rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sngon gyi mthar ma ngamigs so//
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyud phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dbus su mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
[“iaz/ ]kyi bar du sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam pa thums cad mkhyen pa nyid dbus su mi dmigs so//
de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gal to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo// bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gshA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba dang/ 'du shes
dang 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ (shA ra dwa ti'i bu sku mchod dang/khams dang/ rten cing
'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin 'du zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi
phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// 'phags pa'i bden ba rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/
tshad med pa rnams M dang/ gozugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong
pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin/
nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang//
byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhind zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rnam
ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyid pazhin nyid thub pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zub bo// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa ni gting dpag dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa gting dpag dka' bya'o// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag
dkariba'o// skyo na ched dang/ khams dang/ rton rung 'brel par 'byung ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' pa'o//
pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi snga rol du phyin
pa gting dpag dka' bu'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang 2 bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ rnam par shar du
brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams gting
dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gatring dpag dka' bu'o/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dung/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ saM so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams
pa chen po dang/ sAng rje chen po dang/ sas rgyas kyi sa ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba'o//
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'dasu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa'i// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs tshad med pa'i
phyira shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do// shar nA ti'i busmyo mchad dung/ kham sa dang/ rten cing 'brel par byung ba tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med
do ba rolo tu phyin pa thams cad dang/ stong po nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum du rtsa bdun tshar mod pa'i phyir// shes rapa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
tshad med do// 'phags pa'i ba don pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyud dang/
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma mar pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams tshad med bu'i
phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do// ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi sgo tshad med pa'i phyir/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do// de bzhin gshegs ]
pa sogs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma ltas ba
bco brgyad tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa tshad med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad
mad do// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa lags da bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chen po nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs zapa ces bya ba ra ma
sbyong n/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar ma spyod na/ shes rag
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa zab ces bya bar ma spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dad/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun zab ces bya bar mi sbyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
spyod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med ba rnams dang/ gzugs med ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/
dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i soms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes
pa rnams zab ces bya bar ming na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab ces bya bam myong na/ ba shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la song do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang taM ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang//
snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcou0f8brgyang zabacas bya bar ma myongan/ shes rab kyis rdzol tu phyin pa la srid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
kyi bar du zab ces bya bar mi sbyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyod do/// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyishu lnga pa bam
bo zhe gnyis pa// de ci'i phyir zhen/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba dang/ la du shes dang/ 'du/
byed dang/ rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// skyemachad dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i zab pa nyid gang
yin pa de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi
zab pa nyid gang yin pa nga ni byang tshub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshang me da nga dang/
gzugs med pa'i soms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thAr pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan
ma yod pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi zad pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mngon pa shes pa rnams ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang [.]
gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma pa na no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so
gang dag par rig pa bzhi dang 2 byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyib pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad pa yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyil gyi kha ba le zhang yin pa de ni rnam pa h+phams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin/
shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ gal te gzugasagating dpag dka' 'o zhes bya
bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyal rolo tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' 'o zhes bya bar
ma spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la song/ skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'gyur ba gting dpag raka' ro zhes bya bar mi spyod na//
shes rab kyi 'a rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// bal tu phyin pa thams can dang/ stong ba nyid thams cad dang/ byang ba kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gting dpag dka'
tho 'o zhes bya bar m sbyang na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams rang/ gzugs
med ba'i soms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/
za/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams gting dpag dka' 'o zhes bya bar ma spyodan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo/
rnams gAting dpag dka' 'o zhes bya bar ma sbyong n/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang
dag par ga pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyang gting dpag dka' bo zhes bya bar mi sprong na/ shes rab kyi
ga rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gting dpag dka' 'o zhes bya bar ma spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngo// de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba drung/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa'i gdeng
dakhag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rnam pa thums cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi gting dpag dka' bu gang yin pa de na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/
nyid ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen go shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ gal te gzugs tshad
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam pa ru shes pa tshad med/
dazhis byakhangam srong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod do// skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba tshad med do zhes bya bar ma sbyong na/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//parol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi choso sum cu rtsa bdun da med do zhes bya bar mi
spyongan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprong do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
byang ra 'jug pa rnams dang rnam par yur pa brgyang dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang
mngon par shes pa rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi sbyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams tshad med do zhes bya
bar mi spyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/
byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad tshad med do zhes bya bar ma spong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngodzado// rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad med do zhes bya bar ma sbyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi tshad med pa
gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yaTin no// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam pa shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad med pa gang yin pa de na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa// kye ma bcom ldan 'das
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de ltar zab bo// de ltar gting dpag dka' 'o// de ltar rtogs par dka' 'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'di ni de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thug pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i mdun du bshad par mi bgyi ste/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas 'jigs sngang zhing skrag par 'gyur du mchi'o// the tshom dang nem nur 'tshal du mchi'o// mos pa ma mchis par 'gyur du mchi'o
bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan par bgyi ste//
des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// tho tsom dang nem nur 'tshal bar mi 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang gong
nas gong du mos pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chu pa par bgyid pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas
lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun bshA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
sAms dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'du bshade na nyes pa mi 'gyur/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus sbas pa ko'ug ka gal te theg pa la gsar du/
zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na/ da shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa blab mo 'di thos nas
'jigs par 'gyur/ skrag par 'gyur te/ phyir zlog par 'gyur ro// spong bar 'gyur ro// de ni mos par yang ma 'gyur te/ ko'u sha ka theg pa la gsar du zhugs/
tha/ pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sums dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas sbyangs pa'i phyir/ de log par ltung bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par byed/
cing sogs par 'gyur te/ de las byas pa dang bsags pa des kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang bka' ba de
lta bu'i gnas yodado// brgya byin gyis smas pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi snang skug par mi 'gyur ba lha yod dam/ smas pa/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen
po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu na pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ ma 'tshogs mi snang skug par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni ring po ma shogs par blan med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig gam/ gnyis las mi 'da'
bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la
bka' stsal pa// shAr rwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// da de bzhin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes/
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi sngang sag bar mi 'gyur zhing/ thos nas kyang gong du 'dzan ba dang/ 'chad pa dang/ klog pa dang/
kun chub par byed pa dang// ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de dug na yun ring pa nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'o//
pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa'o// sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dpaM gAsal bar
bdag gis stobs so// bde bar gshegs pa de'i dpe bdag gis gsal bar sogs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' skyel pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyi
spobs pa skyed cig/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rdzogs kyi bu 'ame/ rigs kyi bu
ma du rmi lam na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing/ bsam gtan la soms la 'jug ba dang/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang/ bzod pa sgrub pa dang/ tshul khrims
srung ba dang/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba nas snying po byang chub la mchis pa 'i bar du gyur na yang/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo da
ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'a byang chub tu nye bar gyur pas rig par bgyin/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dad 'a sems dpa' chen po gnyid kyi ma log
bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pa dang/ bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pa dang/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang/ grwazod pa gdab pa dang/ tshul
khrims bsrungs pa dang/ sbyin pa yongs su btang ba la ne lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs rtse 'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur par srog bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par gyur to// sngos nas kyang
'dzin cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan du bgyid pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su snyan pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang la chen po gang shes
rab kyi sa rol tu phyin pa rbab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang/ klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la
yang dag par zhugs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzungaba'o//
bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i khyang chub tu lung bstan ba dang nye bar gyur pa ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ganga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad tsang/ 'ad
par gyur nas kyang/ 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo
de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bgyi ba dag go/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la 'brog
gyi dgon pa dpag tshad brgya ba zhig nas byung ngam/ 'brog da ] pa dpag tshad nyis brgya pa 'am/ sum bskyopa 'am/ bzhi brgya pa 'am/ lnga brgya pa nas byung ba zhig
mchis la/ de byung ba'i tshe grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ khams dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi snga ltas/ ba glang dzi'am/ phyogatsirdzi lam/
sa mtshams sam bza' shing gi ra ba phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa mthong ngan/ da ma lags la gzhan yang mtshan ma gang gis/
grong ngan/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam[Y ]khams sum/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor mchis par mngon pa'i snga ltas de lta bu dag mthong na de 'di snyam du gyur te/
snga ltos 'di dag snang ba las na/ 'di nas krong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ khams sam/ rgyul bo'i so srung 'khor du skye'o snyam ste/ dbugs rkyen
bar 'gyur zhing/ de la da slan chad rkun po'i 'jigs pa 'am/ chom po'i 'jigs pa 'am/ gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa 'am bkris pa lam sgom pa'i
'jigs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gang gi tshu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khrub mo 'di 'thad
paragyur te/ 'thud nga ra gyur nas kyang/ 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom
ldan 'das de'i tsho byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'u nga bstan pa la3 bar gyur par bgyis pa yang po ma thogs par/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
ba'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzob su pAr 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de sman chad nyan shos kyi sa 'ag/
'dusangs rgyas kyi sar 'jigs par mi bgyi 'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di lta ste// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang/ mnyan du
mas pa de nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snga ltas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//
de bzhin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis da dung yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus spobs pa skyod cig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dasaM ba da lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig
rgya snyatshomaching rnam chen po blta bar 'tshal nas/ ngo rgya mtsho chen po basmyu ba'i slad du/ de ji lta ji ltar rgyu mtsho chen po dang nye bar mchis pa de lta de ltar lcam bu 'am/ lcam
bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am/ mi'i mtshan ma ma mthong na des/ 'di nas rgyu mtsho chen po de thag nyes 'di nas rgyu mtsho chen por ring po mad do// de'i ci'i phyir zhe no/
rgya mtsho chen pa ni bags kyi gzhol ba ste/ 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po'i drung du dan ring po med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dang nye ba na na ldam bu 'am/ ldum bu'i mtshan ma 'am/
'am/ ri'i mtshan ma ga nga yang bar do zhes bgyi bar rig go/ de ltar skyes bu de'i mig gis rgya mtsho chen po ma mthong du lags kyang/ des bdag ni rgya mtsho chen po dang nye
bar gyur to// rgya mtshon po 'di na yod do// rgya mtsho chen po na' de phan chad mi rung ngo zhes bgyi bar rtogs par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phra mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang zhing klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgying ba'i byang chub sems dpa'/
sems dpa' chen pos kyang/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dkA gcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ khyod bskal pa 'di sang cig/ bskal
brgya phrag na 'di snyed cig bskal pa stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig/ bskal ba brgya stong phrag ni la de dacig/ bskal pa bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi phrag na da
gad tsig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tuman par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon sum du lung bstan pas/ da dung lung ma bstan gyis kyang/ bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstanar dang nye bar gnas par blta'o/
kyag/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'de blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ bsan bkur du yod/
la mnyan du yod do// thos nas kyang gzung du yod do// bcang du yod do// klog tu yod do// kun chub par byar yod do// tshul bzhin du yid la byar yod do zhes bgyi
bar rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na dpyod kyi dus la bab ste/ rtsi shing gi lo ma dang 'dab ma lhags nas/ kha dog tu gyur pa'i tshe/ 'dzam
bu'i gling gi ma rnams kyis ring por ma thogs par lo ma dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu 'byung bar shes par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar snga ltas
'di dag rtsi shing las snang ngo zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ gang gis tshe rtsi shing rnams lo ma dang/ mo togaM dang/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur pa de'i tshe yang bud med dang/
skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang 2 bu mo dag gis rtsi shing gi lo ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa de dag mthong nas nyams bde bar 'gyur ro// bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang//
bstan bkur ba dang/ mnyan du mchis te/ byos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang/ klog cing kun chub par bgyis dang/ tshul ba zhin du yid la bgyid pa de'i tshe/ bcom
ldan 'das byang chub sems dang ra se na sa dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sman par rig par bgyi'o// bcon ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sem na/
dpe' chen po de ni sangs rgyas mang po 'a bsnyen bkur bgyis par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po des kyang 'di ltar
bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bya ba mo 'di blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur ba dang mnyan du yod pa dang/ 'di skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi
phu rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byar yid pa na sngon gyi dag pa'i rtsa ba// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur to zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o//
de nas lha'i bu ston sangs rgyas mthong ba ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po de'i snga ltas de dag mthong nas/ sngon gyi byang
chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lung bstan bar gyur pa la lang snga ltas 'a de dag byung gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang ring po mi
@#// grogs par/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes ngaga' zhing sngo u0fa9la pa da bde zhing nyams bde bar 'gyur ro//
yA bcom ldan 'das 'di la ste/ dbor na bud med sbrum ma ni ji ltar btsar che ba de lta de ltar lus 'gyur te/ de lta de ltar slar zhing lus ngal la skyong zhan cing sa dga' la/ kha
zas yi gar ma mchi zhing rmugs pa dang/ gnyid kyang chung bar 'gyur te/ nyams ma bde ba des smra ba nyung zhing/ bsnyen pa'i ngang tshul can ma mchis la/ sngon gyi tshul
bzhin ma lags pa'i yid la bgying pa bstan pa dang/ bsnyen pa des rnam pa de lta bu'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur taM/ bud med gzhan dag gis bud med de'i mtshan ma ji ltar
@#mthong ba 'dus/ bud med 'di na ring po ma shog pa ra dzatshun bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin dubyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa// sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur grwa/ legs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyan gyis yongs su bzung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa/
rnams la ya/nga shes rab kyi pa rolaM tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'thad par 'gyur te 'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin cing 'tshar ba dang/ klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ tshul
! bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ring po mi thog par/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu lung bstan/
par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis spobs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi
mthus skyes so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de ltar legs par yongs su gzung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor 'dultar byang chub sen/sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni skye bo mang po la phan po dar/ skye bo mang po la 'di
ba dang/ 'jig rten la sAng brtse ba dang/ lha dang ma'i skye po'atshogs phul po ma'i don dang/ phan pa dang 2 bad ba'i phyir bun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/ de dag byang chub sems dang 'i spyad pa spong pa'i tsho/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can brgya stong mang po la phan 'dogs taM bzhi gang
zhe na sbyin pa dang/ stan pa ra sna pa dang/ don sdod pa dang/ don 'thun par spyod pa ste/ de dag gis sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la
yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bsam gan bzhi dang/ tshad med po bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang
bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang dag par skul 'o// bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong la/ gzhan
yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang tshul khrims srung la/ gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang padrod pa sgom la/ gzhan yang
bzod pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom la/ grwazhan yang brtson 'grus yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bsam gtan la soms par
'jug la/ gzhan yang bsam gtun la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang shes rag sgom la/ gzhan yang shes rob bsgom pa la yang dag par skul lo// de dag shas
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rib rtabakod kyang/ bdag rgyun du zhugos pa'i 'bras bu
thob par mi byed do// gzhan lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ thang byang chub la rab tu bkod kyang/ bdag
rang byang chub mngon du ma byed do// bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang
brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su u0f74 gnon 'a// gzhan

yang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu 'god do// bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par sbyong la/gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byed pa la yang dag par skul lo//bdag kyang se

can yongs su smin par byed la/gzhan yang sam can yongs su smin par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mgo bar shes pa skyed la/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon pa shes pa la yang ran par skul lo/ ]
ka @#// dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su sbyong la/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su sbyong ba la yang dag par skul lo//bdag kyang spobs pa phun sum tshogs thob par byed la/

[H ]kazhan yang slobs pa phun sum tshog ba la yang dag par skul ga('dag kyang gtsug phun sum tshogs go ngas su 'dzin zhwa/gzhan yang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba la yang dag par sbrul lo// bdag kyang na phun sum tshogs pa yongs su
'dzin la/gzhan yang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang gzhon nu'i sa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin la/ gzhan yang gzhon nu'i sa phun
sum tshogs pa la yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun skom la/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
la yang dag par sku' lo// bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa bzhi dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ snon pa med pa dang/
[mngon par shes pa lnga sgom la/ gzhan yang mngon par shes pa lnga la ya/nga dag par skul lo// bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
sgom la/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi thums cad 'a ya/nga dag par skul lo// bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ [']ni yi
dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgrub la/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dus
pa bco brgyad 'a yang dag par skul 'o// bdag kyang rnam pa thams rud mkhyen pa nyid thob ngar byed la/ gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brog nga ra byed pa
yang dag par skul lo/ bdag kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu song la/ gzhan yang bag chags kyi mtshungs sbyor ba'i nyon mongs
pa hrams cad song da la yang dag nga ra skul lo// bdag kyang ngos kyi 'khor 'a[']gor 'a/ gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bu la ya'ang dag par skul lo/
ces bka' stsal pa dang/ tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan mang
nga dang ldan pa de dag sems can thams cad kyi sladz+ha du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs nga ra
'tshangasgyu bun/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sen sa dpa'
sams dod na chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa ru 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
'bon bang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la srid pa'i tsho 2 nam gathugs kyi 'brel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba dang/

tu phyin pa bsgom pa longs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'abyor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/

rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ chos shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
chos ma yin zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ 'das shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ ma 'ongs zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi
mthong/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ dge zhes bya ba dang/ ma dge zhes bya ba dang/ lung du ston ces bya ba dang/ lung du mi
ston ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ 'dus byas zhes bya ba dang/ 'dus ma byas zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ 'dod pa'i khamA
shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ gzugs kyi khams zhes bya bur yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ gzugs med pa'i khams shes bya bar yang dag
par rjes su ma mthong/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin paM dang/ shes rab kyi dza rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi
mthong rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nya kyi bar zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de' tsa/ byang chub sems dang 'a sa nas dpa' chen po' shes rab kyi
rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na 2 rab 'byor du ni 'di ltar chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid dang 2 phyir ldog pa/
med pa dang/ gsogrwa dang/ gsib dang snying po med pa dang/ dbang du gyur pa dang/ byed pa med pa dang/ srog med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'i phyir/ bsam
@#//gyis ma khyab pa bstan to// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i phyi bsam gyis
mi khyab pa bstan to// drag 'byor skye mched dang/ khams dang/ na cing 'brel par 'byang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to//
rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'i phyir/ bsam gyis ma khyab po bstan te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i phu
